ModEntry.Name: Zoz OverHaul
ModEntry.Author: Yazed0071
ModEntry.Description:
Thank you for downloading!
This mod aims to do what Enemy OverHaul did, better and more!! Uninstall Enemy OverHaul to avoid known conflicts!
Current features: -Adds Idroid notifications and new voice lines -Adds unused Radio calls and unused Voice lines for Pequad -Adds unused Enemy Radio Calls and some new gameplay functions -Adds unused Enemy Voice Lines and some new gameplay functions -Adds IR Sensros, Burglar Alarm for both missions and free room
-Adds Security Cameras only for the following missions: -- PHANTOM LIMBS --A HERO’S WAY --C2W --OVER THE FENCE --WHERE DO THE BEES SLEEP? - -RED BRASS --ANGEL WITH BROKEN WINGS --HELLBOUND -- PITCH DARK --TRAITORS’ CARAVAN --CODE TALKER --TO KNOW TOO MUCH --CURSED LEGACY
And a bonus 3 Phase BGM tracks
1.2.2 Adds grades to IR sensors and burglar alarms
this mod wasn't going to be possible without the help of the great community
Free room camera
